H0.text: Who founded the TV production company 'David Paradine Productions'. David Attenborough

H1.text: Who founded the TV production company 'David Paradine Productions'. David Jason

H2.text: Who founded the TV production company 'David Paradine Productions'. David Bowie

H3.text: Who founded the TV production company 'David Paradine Productions'. DAVID FROST

A4.text: Sir David Paradine Frost... Setting up David Paradine Ltd in 1966, he part-financed The Rise and Rise of Michael Rimmer (1970), in which the lead character was based partly on Frost, and gained an executive producer credit.
